description: This table supplements the PATIENT table. It contains basic information about patients.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: INTERPRT_NEEDED_CMT
columns.description: Comments regarding the patient's interpreter needs

columns.name: DENT_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the comment of the current dental classification

columns.name: ESRD_G_START_DT
columns.description: The first date that the acute comorbidity of gastrointestinal bleeding was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD).

columns.name: ESRD_B_START_DT
columns.description: The first date that the acute comorbidity of bacterial pneumonia was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD).

columns.name: ESRD_P_START_DT
columns.description: The first date that the acute comorbidity of pericarditis was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD).

columns.name: CMS_OP_ESRD_TRAIN_H
columns.description: The number of training session that have been performed for a patient's hemodialysis treatment through his/her life time.

columns.name: CMS_OP_ESRD_TRAIN_P
columns.description: The number of training session that have been performed for a patient's peritoneal dialysis treatment through his/her life time.

columns.name: FOH_ID
columns.description: This item stores the filing order history ID for the member.

columns.name: TXP_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient is a transplant patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: BLIND_YN
columns.description:
Indicates the patient is blind.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: DEAF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates the patient is deaf.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: EMPR_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the county in which the patient's employer is located.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ALRGY_REV_EPT_CSN
columns.description: This column contains the source encounter where allergies were most recently reviewed. If allergies were most recently reviewed outside the context of an encounter, the value is blank.

columns.name: OCCUPATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category list for the patient's occupation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INDUSTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category list for the industry in which the patient works.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EDUCATION_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's highest level of education achieved.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LOC_EDUCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Location of the patient's highest level of education.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PARENT_EDU_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Parent/guardian's highest level of education achieved.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDUCATION_LEVEL_C_NAME

columns.name: PARENT_LOC_EDU_C_NAME
columns.description:
Location of parent/guardian's highest level of education.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LOC_EDUCATION_C_NAME

columns.name: RES_OF_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of residence category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: US_CITIZEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a citizen of the USA.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PERMANENT_RESIDENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a permanent resident of the USA.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: US_CITIZEN_YN

columns.name: CNTRY_SUBDIV_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's country subdivision code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: RACE_COLL_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The race and ethnicity collection method category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PAT_NO_COMM_PREF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores why the patient doesn't have a preference for receiving communication related to reminders and follow-up care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Preference

columns.name: FST_LIVE_BIRTH_AGE
columns.description: The patient's age at first live birth.

columns.name: RSH_PREF_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the patient's explicit research recruitment preference.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


OK to Contact


Do Not Contact


Undecided

columns.name: RSH_PREF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the instant that the patient last indicated an explicit research recruitment preference.

columns.name: RSH_PREF_USER_ID
columns.description: Indicates the user who last recorded the patient's explicit research recruitment preference.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_DEATH_DATE
columns.description: The patient's date of death as reported by an external organization. This column is typically populated by importing data through the Patient Load utility.

columns.name: DEATH_DATA_IMPORT_DATE
columns.description: The date the Patient Load utility populated EXTERNAL_DEATH_DATE for this patient.

columns.name: DEATH_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Describes the location where the patient died. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INDIGENOUS_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient is considered indigenous.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_LIVING_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column uses information from the chart to determine if the patient represents a real patient. If considered a patient the column returns whether or not the patient is Alive or Deceased. If the record does not represent a real patient then Not A Patient is returned. Patients with blank and custom statuses in the patient status item EPT 102 are assumed Alive. The logic for Not A Patient is identical to EPT 109 - Valid Patient except that test patients can be considered Alive or Deceased.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Alive


Deceased


Not A Patient

columns.name: IS_FETAL_DEMISE_YN
columns.description:
This column is used to indicate the state of patient's chart due to fetal demise.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: ERROR_NEWBORN_YN
columns.description:
This column is used to indicate that the newborn chart was created in error.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: MEDSYNC_IS_PARTICIPANT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a participant in the outpatient pharmacy medication synchronization program.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: MEDSYNC_RECURRENCE
columns.description: Stores the number of days that are to be between a patient's medication synchronization refills.

columns.name: MEDSYNC_REFILLDATE_DATE
columns.description: Stores a medication synchronization dispense date for the patient.

columns.name: REFILLMGMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for a General Use Notes (HNO) record for comments regarding the patient's refill management.

columns.name: IHS_ENROLLMENT_NUM
columns.description: This is the American Indian tribal enrollment ID number for the patient.

columns.name: IHS_BENEFICIARY_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Classification of the type of patient, indicating a category under which an individual can become eligible for Indian Health Services (IHS) benefits.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Indian or Alaskan Native


PHS Field Employees


PHS Commissioned Officer


PHS Commissioned Officer Dependent


BEC Beneficary


Non-Indian (Emergency Case)


VISTA


Other


Military


Retired


Federal Employee (Non-PHS)


Coast Guard


Coast Guard Dependents


American Seamen


Foreign Seamen


Immigration Detainee


National Guard


Non-Indian Elective


NOAA Personnel


NOAA Personnel Dependent


Special Duty


Alaska Handicapped Children's Program Applicants


Military Active Duty Personnel Dependents


Military Retired Personnel Dependents


U.S. Coast Guard Retired Personnel


U.S. Coast Guard Retired Personnel Dependents


U.S. Military Academy Candidates


U.S. PHS Retired Commissioned Officers


U.S. PHS Retired Commissioned Officers Dependents


Non-Indian Dependent


Non-Indian (Fee Charged)

columns.name: IHS_PRIMARY_TRIBE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's primary tribe.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IHS_PRIM_TRIBE_BLOOD_QUANTUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item designates the blood quantum for the patient's primary tribe.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Full


Greater Than or Equal to 1/2 but Less Than Full


Greater Than or Equal to 1/4 but Less Than 1/2


Indian but Less Than 1/4


Non-Indian


Unspecified


Unknown

columns.name: IHS_COMMUNITY_OF_RESIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's community of residence is a subdivision of the state and county in which the patient resides.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IHS_RESIDENCE_SINCE_DATE
columns.description: Date when the patient first moved to this community of residence (I EPT 4104).

columns.name: IHS_SERVICE_ELIGIBILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the types of services for which this patient is eligible.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CHS & Direct


Direct Only


Ineligible


Pending Verification

columns.name: GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's gender identity.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: CURRENT_JOB_START_DATE
columns.description: The date a patient started in her current job.

columns.name: SEX_ASGN_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the patient's sex assigned at birth.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Not recorded on birth certificate


Choose not to disclose


Uncertain

columns.name: PREFERENCES_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the communication preferences record for the patient.

columns.name: DEATH_INFO_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source that provided the information on the patient's death outside of the organization. This item will allow for more tracking on the patients who died outside of the organization, and allow for more accurate data on deceased patients.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BLOOD_REQTS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the blood special requirements were last edited

columns.name: BLOOD_REQTS_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that set the current special requirements for a patient

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the linked address changes were initiated.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_SOURCE
columns.description: The source record that initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: EDD_BASIS_OB_DT_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Basis for the patient's expected date of delivery (EDD). Used to track the dating basis for the patient's EDD when the patient does not have a pregnancy episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other Basis


Last Menstrual Period


Est. Date of Conception


Embryo Transfer


Ultrasound


Uterus Size


Quickening


Fundal Ht. at Umbil.


FHR with Doppler


FHR with Fetoscope


Patient Reported


Alternate EDD Entry

columns.name: VETERAN_DENTAL_CVG_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Each patient can have up to one dental coverage. The dental coverage denotes how much dental services a veteran can receive prior to being billed. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_VETERAN_DENTAL_CVG table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: VETERAN_IS_COMBAT_COVERED_YN
columns.description:
This column stores a Yes/No value that indicates whether or not a patient is covered for their service in combat.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN

columns.name: VETERAN_COMBAT_EXP_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the expiration date of a patient's combat-level coverage.

columns.name: VETERAN_PRIORITY_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Each patient can have up to one priority group. The priority group is a list of veteran coverage priorities that is maintained by the Department of Veteran Affairs. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_VETERAN_PRIORITY_GROUP table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: VETERAN_ENROLLMENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Each patient can have up to one enrollment status. This denotes whether or not a patient's coverage levels are active or otherwise. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_VETERAN_ENROLL_STATUS table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Pending

columns.name: LEGACY_HICN
columns.description: Stores the patient's Health Insurance Claim Number (HICN) if one was previously available and we've received their Medicare Beneficiary Number (MBI) (stored in PATIENT.MEDICARE_NUM). This value may be needed to look up members during the transition to MBI.

columns.name: RSH_PREF_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Indicates the MyChart user who last recorded the patient's explicit research recruitment preference.

columns.name: NEPH_ESRD_START_DT
columns.description: This item is used to store the date of the patient's first regular chronic dialysis treatment.

columns.name: NEPH_PCRF_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item is used to store the dialysis patient's primary cause of renal failure.

columns.name: NEPH_2728_VERIFY_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the dialysis patient's form-2728 was verified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_PAT_YN
